      • disposeTMView

        public void disposeTMView()

      • loadData

        public void loadData(java.lang.String Gtape1,
                     java.lang.String Gtape2,
                     java.lang.String Gtape3,
                     java.lang.String IS,
                     java.lang.String path)
              throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                     ParserException
        Takes data from the view and stores it to be used in the main logic of the code. Then uses this data to find the state and prepare the Turing machine for execution.
        Parameters:
        Gtape2 - the tape initially entered in the text box on GUI
        IS - the initial state entered in the text box on the GUI
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if source file doesn't exist
        ParserException - if syntax error(s) are encountered
